original_title: Looney Tunes Super Stars Bugs Bunny: Hare Extraordinaire
overview: Never offered before in this format, these classic and completely remastered Looney Tunes shorts capture everyone's favorite wascally wabbit, Bugs Bunny, in his element - and all of his animated glory.
title: Looney Tunes Super Stars Bugs Bunny: Hare Extraordinaire
